DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate the superiority of YM060 to a placebo in global assessment of relief of overall IBS symptoms and stool form normalization, and to evaluate safety in female patients with diarrhea-predominant irritable bowel syndrome (D-IBS).
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of YM060 in Female Patients With Diarrhea-predominant Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
